text: Omulangira anavunaanyizibwanga okuwaayo ebiweebwayo ebyokebwa, n’ebiweebwayo eby’obutta, n’ebiweebwayo eby’okunywa ku mbaga ez’emyezi egyakaboneka n’eza Ssabbiiti, ne ku mbaga zonna ezaalagirwa ez’ennyumba ya Isirayiri; y’anaagabulanga ebiweebwayo olw’ebibi, n’ebiweebwayo eby’obutta, n’ebiweebwayo ebyokebwa, n’ebiweebwayo olw’emirembe, okutangiriranga ennyumba ya Isirayiri.
